gettingStarted.title: Getting Started with Apper
gettingStarted.description: A beginner-friendly, comprehensive guided tour for new users learning how to use Apper, the AI app builder

sections.title: What is Apper?
sections.content: Think of Apper as your personal AI assistant that builds full applications for you! You simply chat with it like you would with a friend, describing what you want to create, and Apper handles everything else. No need to write code, pick templates, or connect different tools - Apper does it all in one place. It's like having a conversation with a developer who instantly understands your vision and brings it to life!
highlights: Chat naturally with AI to build complete apps
No coding, templates, or technical setup required
Everything handled in one conversation-based interface
Get professional results in minutes, not months

sections.title: Why Apper Stands Out
sections.content: What makes Apper special is its all-in-one nature. While other tools make you juggle multiple platforms for design, hosting, payments, and databases, Apper manages everything through natural conversation. Just tell it what you want, and it handles the layout, sets up payments, creates databases, and makes everything work together seamlessly. It's like having an entire development team in your pocket!
highlights: All-in-one platform - no juggling multiple tools
Conversation-based workflow feels natural and intuitive
Automatic handling of complex technical requirements

sections.title: What You Can Build
sections.content: Apper can create almost any type of web application you can imagine! Here are some popular examples:

features.name: Business Tools
features.description: CRM systems, project management apps, inventory trackers, employee dashboards
features.howToUse: Try: 'Create a customer management system for my small business with contact tracking and follow-up reminders'

features.name: Client Portals
features.description: Customer dashboards, support systems, booking platforms, service portals
features.howToUse: Try: 'Build a client portal where customers can view their project status and submit support tickets'

features.name: SaaS Applications
features.description: Subscription services, productivity tools, analytics platforms, automation tools
features.howToUse: Try: 'Create a social media scheduling tool with analytics and team collaboration features'

features.name: Online Stores
features.description: E-commerce sites, marketplaces, digital product stores, subscription boxes
features.howToUse: Try: 'Build an online store for handmade jewelry with payment processing and inventory management'

features.name: Interactive Apps
features.description: Quiz platforms, learning tools, games, surveys, interactive experiences
features.howToUse: Try: 'Create a trivia game app with leaderboards and different difficulty levels'

features.name: Websites & Portfolios
features.description: Professional websites, portfolios, blogs, landing pages, company sites
features.howToUse: Try: 'Build a portfolio website for a photographer with gallery, contact form, and booking system'

sections.title: Create Your First App
sections.content: Ready to create your first app? It's as simple as having a conversation! Here's how to get started:

steps.title: Start with a Simple Prompt
steps.description: Just type what you want to create. Examples: 'Make a booking app for my salon' or 'Create a quiz game about animals'. Don't worry about being perfect - you can always refine it!

steps.title: Use ChatGPT to Improve Your Prompt (Optional)
steps.description: Want better results? Ask ChatGPT: 'Help me write a detailed prompt for Apper to create [your app idea]. Include specific features, design preferences, and functionality.' Then use that improved prompt in Apper!

steps.title: Submit and Watch the Magic
steps.description: Hit enter and watch as Apper builds your app in real-time! You'll see pages being created, features being added, and your vision coming to life right before your eyes.

steps.title: Chat to Refine
steps.description: Not quite right? Just tell Apper what to change: 'Make the header blue', 'Add a contact form', or 'Change the layout to be more modern'. It responds instantly!

sections.title: The Apper Builder Interface
sections.content: Once your app is created, you'll see the Apper Builder with four main sections. Don't worry - they're much simpler than they sound!

features.name: Customize App
features.description: This is where you chat with Apper to make changes to your app's design, add features, or modify content.
features.howToUse: Simply type what you want to change, like 'Add a photo gallery' or 'Change the color scheme to green and white'

features.name: Manage App
features.description: Handle your app's settings, user permissions, domain name, and publishing options.
features.howToUse: Use this section to rename your app, set up user accounts, connect a custom domain, or publish your app live

features.name: Code (Optional)
features.description: Advanced users can see and modify the actual code, but you never need to touch this section!
features.howToUse: Ignore this completely! Apper handles all the technical stuff. This is only for developers who want to peek under the hood

features.name: Database
features.description: See and manage the data your app collects (like user accounts, form submissions, or product information).
features.howToUse: View data your app has collected, export information, or ask Apper to modify how data is stored and organized

sections.title: What Happens Behind the Scenes
sections.content: Curious about what Apper does when you submit a prompt? Here's the magic process that happens in seconds:

steps.title: Analyzes Your Request
steps.description: Apper's AI reads your prompt and understands what type of app you want, what features you need, and how it should look and function.

steps.title: Builds Pages and Features
steps.description: It creates all the pages your app needs, adds the requested features, and sets up the navigation and user flow.

steps.title: Sets Up Data Management
steps.description: Apper automatically creates databases to store your app's information and sets up forms to collect user data.

steps.title: Shows You the First Version
steps.description: Your app appears on screen, fully functional and ready to use! Plus, you'll see a chat window on the side for making changes.

sections.title: Editing and Expanding Your App
sections.content: The real magic happens when you start chatting with Apper's AI assistant to improve your app. It's like having a conversation with a helpful developer!

features.name: Natural Conversation
features.description: Talk to Apper like you would a friend. Use everyday language to describe what you want.
features.howToUse: Examples: 'Add a login page', 'Make the button bigger', 'I want users to upload photos', 'Change the font to something more modern'

features.name: Instant Changes
features.description: Watch your app update in real-time as you make requests. Changes appear immediately!
features.howToUse: Make a request and see it happen instantly. No waiting, no complicated processes - just immediate results

features.name: Add Any Feature
features.description: Whether it's payment processing, user accounts, or complex functionality, just ask for it!
features.howToUse: Try: 'Add Stripe payments', 'Users should be able to leave reviews', 'Include a search function', 'Add email notifications'

features.name: Refine Until Perfect
features.description: Keep chatting until your app is exactly what you envisioned. There's no limit to changes!
features.howToUse: Don't settle for 'good enough' - keep refining: 'Move that section up', 'Make it more colorful', 'Add animation to the buttons'

sections.title: Troubleshooting Errors
sections.content: Don't worry if something goes wrong - Apper has you covered! You never need to fix technical issues yourself.

features.name: Fix It Now Button
features.description: If any error occurs, you'll see a 'Fix It Now' button that automatically resolves the issue.
features.howToUse: Simply click the button and Apper will diagnose and fix the problem automatically. No technical knowledge required!

features.name: Automatic Problem Detection
features.description: Apper continuously monitors your app and catches issues before they become problems.
features.howToUse: Apper works behind the scenes to prevent errors. If something does go wrong, you'll be notified with a simple solution

features.name: Smart Suggestions
features.description: If Apper can't understand your request, it will suggest clearer ways to ask for what you want.
features.howToUse: Pay attention to Apper's suggestions - they help you communicate more effectively and get better results

features.name: Human Support
features.description: If automatic fixes don't work, human experts are available to help resolve any issues.
features.howToUse: Use the support chat if you encounter persistent problems. Our team will help get your app working perfectly

sections.title: App Versions
sections.content: Every change you make creates a new version of your app. Think of it like save points in a video game - you can always go back!

features.name: Automatic Version Saving
features.description: Apper automatically saves every change as a new version, so you never lose your work.
features.howToUse: Make changes freely! Every modification is automatically saved and you can see a list of all versions in your app history

features.name: Easy Version Switching
features.description: Switch between any version instantly to compare changes or revert to an earlier state.
features.howToUse: Click on any version in your history to preview it. If you like an older version better, you can restore it with one click

features.name: Preview Before Committing
features.description: Preview any version before making it your main app version.
features.howToUse: Test different versions to see how they work and look before deciding which one to keep as your live app

features.name: Version Restoration
features.description: Restore any previous version if you change your mind about recent updates.
features.howToUse: Made changes you don't like? No problem! Just select an earlier version and restore it - all your data will be preserved

sections.title: Mobile vs Desktop Preview
sections.content: Your app needs to look great on all devices! Apper makes it easy to see how your app appears on different screen sizes.

features.name: Mobile Preview
features.description: See exactly how your app looks and works on smartphones and tablets.
features.howToUse: Click the mobile icon to switch to mobile view. Test all features to ensure they work well on smaller screens

features.name: Desktop Preview
features.description: View your app as it appears on laptop and desktop computers.
features.howToUse: Click the desktop icon to see the full desktop experience. This is usually the default view when building

features.name: Easy Toggle
features.description: Switch between mobile and desktop views instantly to compare the experience.
features.howToUse: Use the toggle buttons to quickly switch between views while making changes to ensure both versions look great

features.name: Responsive Design
features.description: Apper automatically adjusts your app to look good on all screen sizes.
features.howToUse: If something doesn't look right on mobile, just tell Apper: 'Make this mobile-friendly' or 'Optimize the layout for phones'

sections.title: Manage App Settings
sections.content: The Manage App section is where you handle all the business side of your app - naming, user access, and login options.

features.name: App Naming and Branding
features.description: Change your app's name, description, and basic branding elements.
features.howToUse: Simply update the app name field and description. You can also ask Apper to update branding throughout your app

features.name: User Permissions
features.description: Control who can access your app and what they can do inside it.
features.howToUse: Set whether your app is public, requires login, or is invite-only. Define different user roles like admin, member, or viewer

features.name: Login Methods
features.description: Choose how users sign up and log in to your app.
features.howToUse: Enable login with Google, Facebook, email, or phone number. You can allow multiple options or restrict to specific methods

features.name: Domain Management
features.description: Set up your app's web address (URL) for easy sharing.
features.howToUse: Use the free Apper subdomain or connect your own custom domain name for a professional appearance

sections.title: Onboarding and Emails
sections.content: Apper handles all the system emails your app needs to send, like confirmations and password resets. You can customize them too!

features.name: Email Confirmation
features.description: Automatic emails sent when users sign up to verify their email address.
features.howToUse: Apper sends these automatically. You can customize the message by asking: 'Change the welcome email to include our company logo'

features.name: Password Reset
features.description: Secure password reset emails for users who forget their login information.
features.howToUse: These work automatically. Users click 'Forgot Password' and get a secure reset link via email

features.name: OTP (One-Time Passwords)
features.description: Security codes sent via email or SMS for extra account protection.
features.howToUse: Enable two-factor authentication by asking Apper: 'Add OTP verification for user logins for extra security'

features.name: Email Customization
features.description: Personalize all system emails with your branding and messaging.
features.howToUse: Tell Apper: 'Customize all emails with our brand colors and logo' or 'Make the welcome email more friendly and personal'

sections.title: Billing and Revenue
sections.content: Ready to make money from your app? Apper makes it incredibly easy to set up payments and billing!

features.name: Pricing Tiers
features.description: Create different subscription plans with varying features and prices.
features.howToUse: Ask Apper: 'Create three pricing tiers: Basic ($10/month), Pro ($25/month), and Enterprise ($50/month) with different features'

features.name: Credits and Tokens
features.description: Sell usage-based credits that users can spend on your app's features.
features.howToUse: Try: 'Let users buy credit packs - 100 credits for $5, 500 credits for $20' for pay-per-use features

features.name: One-Time Purchases
features.description: Sell products, services, or premium features as single purchases.
features.howToUse: Ask: 'Add a one-time purchase option for premium templates at $15 each' or sell physical/digital products

features.name: Stripe Integration
features.description: Secure payment processing through Stripe for credit cards and other payment methods.
features.howToUse: Tell Apper: 'Connect Stripe for payments' and it handles all the technical setup. You just need to create a Stripe account

sections.title: Code Section (Optional)
sections.content: Good news - you can completely ignore this section! But here's what it's for if you're curious:

features.name: Not Required
features.description: You never need to look at or understand code to use Apper successfully.
features.howToUse: Simply ignore this section completely! Apper handles all the technical programming automatically

features.name: For Developers
features.description: Technical users can view and modify the actual code that powers your app.
features.howToUse: Only useful if you're a programmer who wants to make advanced customizations that can't be done through conversation

features.name: Advanced Customization
features.description: Developers can add custom functionality or integrate with external services.
features.howToUse: If you have a developer friend, they can use this section to add very specific features that Apper can't create through chat

features.name: Learning Opportunity
features.description: Curious about how apps work? You can peek at the code to learn!
features.howToUse: Feel free to explore and see how Apper built your app, but remember - you never need to modify anything here

sections.title: Database Setup
sections.content: Don't let the word 'database' scare you! It's just where your app stores information, and Apper handles everything automatically.

features.name: Automatic Setup
features.description: Apper automatically creates and manages databases for your app's data storage needs.
features.howToUse: Nothing to do here! When you ask for features like 'user accounts' or 'contact forms', Apper automatically sets up data storage

features.name: Employee Apps
features.description: Apps for your team where everyone has access to shared company data and tools.
features.howToUse: Tell Apper: 'Create an employee management system' - all staff can access shared information and tools

features.name: Customer-Facing Apps
features.description: Apps for your customers where each user only sees their own data and account information.
features.howToUse: Ask for: 'Build a customer portal' - each customer gets their own private account with their personal data

features.name: Permission Management
features.description: Control who can see and edit different types of information in your app.
features.howToUse: Request: 'Only managers can see all employee data, regular staff can only see their own information' for proper privacy

faq.question: Do I need any technical skills to use Apper?
faq.answer: Not at all! Apper is designed for everyone, regardless of technical background. If you can describe what you want in plain English, you can create professional applications with Apper. Think of it like having a conversation with a helpful friend who happens to be an expert developer.

faq.question: How long does it take to create an app?
faq.answer: Most basic apps are created within minutes of submitting your prompt. More complex applications with many features might take 10-15 minutes, but you'll see progress in real-time as Apper builds your application. The best part is you can start using and testing your app immediately!

faq.question: What if I want to change something after my app is created?
faq.answer: Making changes is incredibly easy! Just describe what you'd like to modify in the chat, and Apper will update your application accordingly. You can make unlimited changes - there's no limit to how many times you can refine and improve your app.

faq.question: Can I create any type of application?
faq.answer: Apper can create a vast variety of web applications including business websites, e-commerce stores, portfolios, blogs, booking systems, SaaS tools, games, databases, and much more. If you can describe it clearly, Apper can almost certainly build it!

faq.question: How much does it cost to use Apper?
faq.answer: Apper offers various pricing plans to fit different needs. Basic app creation and hosting are available on free plans, while advanced features like custom domains, premium integrations, and higher usage limits are available on paid plans with transparent pricing.

faq.question: Is my app secure and reliable?
faq.answer: Yes! All Apper applications include industry-standard security measures, SSL encryption, reliable hosting, and automatic backups. Your users' data and your application are fully protected with enterprise-grade security that you don't have to worry about.

faq.question: Can I use my own domain name?
faq.answer: Absolutely! While Apper provides free subdomains (like yourapp.apper.com), you can easily connect your own custom domain name (like yourapp.com) to give your application a professional, branded web address.

faq.question: What happens if I need help or get stuck?
faq.answer: Apper includes comprehensive support to help you succeed. The AI assistant can answer most questions instantly, there's extensive documentation and tutorials, and human support is available for more complex issues. You're never alone in building your app!

faq.question: Can I collaborate with team members on my app?
faq.answer: Yes! You can invite team members to collaborate on your application. Everyone can make changes and suggestions using the same conversational interface, making teamwork smooth and efficient.

faq.question: What if I want to migrate my app elsewhere later?
faq.answer: While Apper is designed to be your long-term solution, you always maintain control of your data. You can export your information, and since Apper generates standard web applications, migration options are available if your needs change significantly.

tips.title: Start with Clear, Detailed Prompts
tips.description: The more specific you are about what you want, the better your results will be. Instead of 'make a website', try 'create a portfolio website for a wedding photographer with a gallery, contact form, booking calendar, and pricing page with elegant, romantic styling.'

tips.title: Use ChatGPT to Improve Your Prompts
tips.description: Before submitting to Apper, ask ChatGPT: 'Help me write a detailed prompt for Apper to create [your idea]'. This often results in much more comprehensive and effective prompts that get you better results faster.

tips.title: Think About Your Users First
tips.description: Consider who will use your app and what they need to accomplish. Describe user scenarios like 'customers should be able to easily browse products, add items to cart, and checkout in under 3 clicks' to help Apper create better user experiences.

tips.title: Start Simple, Then Add Features
tips.description: Begin with a basic version of your app and then gradually add features through conversation. This approach helps you see progress quickly and ensures each new feature integrates well with what you already have.

tips.title: Test Everything Before Publishing
tips.description: Click every button, fill out every form, and try every feature before making your app live. Test on both mobile and desktop views to ensure everything works perfectly for all your users.

tips.title: Use Real Examples and References
tips.description: When describing your app, reference existing websites or apps you admire. Saying 'make the layout like Airbnb but for local services' or 'design it similar to Stripe's clean, professional style' gives Apper clear direction.

tips.title: Don't Be Afraid to Iterate
tips.description: Your first version doesn't need to be perfect! Make changes, try different approaches, and refine your app through conversation. Apper makes it easy to experiment and improve until you're completely satisfied.

tips.title: Plan Your Content in Advance
tips.description: Have your text, images, and other content ready before you start. This helps you create more detailed prompts and speeds up the customization process once your app is built.
